quest.name: Funky Cat
quest.desc:
Equip the entire Technokitty outfit to complete the quest.
* The Technokitty outfit consists of 6 items. The entire set must be equipped.
Male: $item:11850151$, $item:11150047$, $item:11304781$, $item:11710013$, $item:11604690$, $item:12200527$ Female: $item:11850152$, $item:11150048$, $item:11304782$, $item:11710014$, $item:11604691$, $item:12200528$

quest.name: Items Worth Paying Attention To
quest.desc: Some outfits obtained from the $item:20301206$ contain hidden quests! Pay attention to the outfit icons and tooltips to find them!

quest.name: Items Worth Paying Attention To
quest.desc: Some outfits grant special rewards when you equip the full set, so pay attention when you see an explanation mark on an outfit's icon!
